word_mean: 醛固酮：肾上腺皮质分泌的主要盐类皮质激素，主要生物学作用为促使肾脏潴钠(从而潴水)、排钾以调节电解质和水的平衡
水潴留可使血浆容量增加、水肿及血压增高
血管紧张素Ⅱ可促使醛固酮分泌

sentence.Network_en: The principal adrenocortical products are aldosterone, cortisol and dehydroepiandrosterone sulphate.
sentence.Network_cn: 肾上腺皮质的主要产物为醛固酮 、 皮质醇和脱氢异雄酮硫酸盐.

sentence.Network_en: In the renin - angiotensin - aldosterone system, the juxtaglomerular apparatus helps regulate volume and pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 在肾素 - 血管紧张素 - 醛固酮系统中, 肾小球旁体帮助调节血容量和压力.

sentence.Network_en: But the renin - angiotensin - aldosterone system had a very active, mainly hyperactivating, response.
sentence.Network_cn: 肾素 - 血管紧张素 - 醛固酮系统反应活跃, 一般以偏高居多.

means.word_mean: 1. a corticosteroid hormone that is secreted by the cortex of the adrenal gland; regulates salt (sodium and potassium) and water balance
